vecHighlight.strDescription: Hire a unique unit from a Barbarian Clan.

vecHighlight.strName: Jack of all Trades, Master of None
vecHighlight.strDescription: Win a game on a Standard sized map or larger with 5 or more Industries, but no Corporations.
Win a regular game on the Archipelago Map
Win a regular game as Hammurabi.
Playing as Japan, have a district with 6 adjacent unpillaged districts
Achieve first place in all three Nobel Prizes in the same game
As Kristina, at the start of a turn have cities in five different terrain types (Snow, Tundra, Desert, Plains and Grassland) and have Open Air Museums in all of them

vecHighlight.strName: Let's Do the Time Warp Again
vecHighlight.strDescription: As Babylon, earn 5 tech boosts for techs that are at least one era later than your current era.
Win a regular game as Sejong
Make a peace deal which includes you giving or receiving an Olives resource
Control 5 Luxury Resource Monopolies at once on a Standard sized map or larger.

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Be the first player to circumnavigate the world after Ferdinand Magellan has been recruited by another player
Gain control of an Ally's city after it becomes disloyal, and choose to keep it
Possess 6 Silver luxury resources at the start of the turn
Build every district type in one city and the Colosseum
Completely surround your Government Plaza with districts or wonders you own at the start of the turn
Win a regular game on a Tiny Map
Win a regular game on a Duel Map
Activate Darwin adjacent to the Galapagos Islands
Build a Colossal Head adjacent to a Holy Site with a Temple.
Have top secret access with five civilizations in one game at once.
Win a regular game as Gilgamesh
Win a regular game as Pericles

data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/289070/extras/Anthology_Infographic_EN.png?t=1728608297[/img]
[i]Civilization VI[/i] offers new ways to engage with your world: cities now physically expand across the map, active research in technology and culture unlocks new potential, and competing leaders will pursue their own agendas based on their historical traits as you race for one of five ways to achieve victory in the game.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/289070/extras/GIF1EMPIRES.gif?t=1728608297[/img]
‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/289070/extras/EN-ExpansiveEmpires_QA.png?t=1728608297[/img]
[list][*]See the marvels of your empire spread across the map like never before. Each district, wonder, and improvement is built on its own hex, allowing you to customize your city to your heart’s content.
[*]From the Commercial Hub to the Spaceport, every district provides unique and powerful bonuses. Pick and choose which districts to build to fit your needs!
[*]Build better than your opponents, place yourself strategically for your allies, and become the best civilization on Earth.
[/list]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/289070/extras/GIF2RESEARCH.gif?t=1728608297[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/289070/extras/EN-ActiveResearch_QA.png?t=1728608297[/img]
[list][*]Boost your civilization’s progress through history to unlock powerful bonuses before anyone else! To advance more quickly, use your units to actively explore, develop your environment, and discover new cultures.
[*]Research isn’t just limited to science. Explore the Civics tree to unlock powerful new governments and cultural policies
[*]Cultivate the civilization that fits your playstyle, or switch it up every time you play![/list]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/289070/extras/GIF3DIPLOMACY.gif?t=1728608297[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/289070/extras/EN-DynamicDiplomacy_QA.png?t=1728608297[/img]
[list][*]As the game progresses, so do your diplomatic relationships. From primitive first interactions where conflict is a fact of life, to late game alliances and negotiations.
[*]Carry influence with nearby city states to gain its diplomatic allegiance and earn game-changing city-state bonuses
[*]Enlist spies to gather crucial intel on rival civilizations, steal precious resources, and even topple governments.[/list]
data.strSnippet: Civilization VI is the newest installment in the award winning Civilization Franchise. Expand your empire, advance your culture and go head-to-head against history’s greatest leaders. Will your civilization stand the test of time?
